items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system that suggests relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
System supports recommendations for both logged-in and guest users using session data.
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: No actionable feedback was provided ('hbhg'), so no changes were made to the existing requirements.
